collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.intro: CharityHub collects information to provide better services to all our users and to maintain the security of our platform.
collect.paymentInfo: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.intro: We use the information we collect to:
use.sendUpdates: Send you campaign updates and notifications
use.preventFraud: Prevent fraud and maintain platform security
use.improveServices: Improve our services and user experience

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
sharing.withCreators: With campaign creators when you make a contribution
sharing.withProviders: With service providers who assist in our operations
sharing.whenRequired: When required by law or to protect rights and safety
sharing.merger: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. All payment transactions are encrypted using SSL technology. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
rights.exportData: Export your data in a portable format

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience, analyse usage patterns, and deliver personalised content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our platform is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@charityhub.com

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using CharityHub, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
accounts.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account
accounts.accurateInfo: You must provide accurate and complete information
accounts.security: You are responsible for maintaining account security
accounts.noMultiple: One person or entity may not maintain multiple accounts
accounts.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activity.

campaigns.title: 3. Campaigns and Fundraising
campaigns.accurateCampaign: Provide accurate and truthful information about their campaign
campaigns.useFunds: Use funds only for the stated purpose
campaigns.fulfillRewards: Fulfil any promised rewards or refund contributions
campaigns.complyLaws: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

payments.title: 4. Contributions and Payments
payments.intro: All contributions are final and non-refundable unless:
payments.fraudulent: The campaign is fraudulent or violates our terms
payments.failedRewards: The creator fails to fulfil promised rewards
payments.cancelled: The campaign is cancelled before funds are transferred
payments.fees: CharityHub charges a platform fee of 5% on all successful contributions, plus payment processing fees.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.license: By posting content on CharityHub, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide licence to use, display, and distribute your content in connection with our services.
ip.ownership: You retain all ownership rights to your content and are responsible for ensuring you have the rights to all content you post.

disputes.title: 6. Dispute Resolution
disputes.attemptResolve: If you have a dispute with another user, you agree to first attempt to resolve it directly with that user. CharityHub may, at its discretion, provide assistance in resolving disputes.
disputes.jurisdiction: Any legal disputes will be governed by the laws of California and subject to the jurisdiction of courts in San Francisco County.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: CharityHub acts as a platform connecting campaign creators and contributors. We do not:
liability.noGuarantee: Guarantee the success of any campaign
liability.noVerify: Verify the accuracy of campaign information
liability.disclaimer: You use CharityHub at your own risk. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the platform or from campaigns you support.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Continued use of CharityHub after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@charityhub.com
